tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_dependencies (
    project_id INT,
    dependency_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE task_sequences (
  task_id INT NOT NULL,
  task_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_order INT NOT NULL,
  project_id INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (task_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_dependencies(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Dependency (
    dependency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    dependent_project_id INT,
    foreign key (project_id) references Project(project_id),
    foreign key (dependent_project_id) references Project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Task (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    duration INT,
    foreign key (project_id) references Project(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CriticalPath (
    sequence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    dependency_id INT,
    foreign key (project_id) references Project(project_id),
    foreign key (task_id) references Task(task_id),
    foreign key (dependency_id) references Dependency(dependency_id)
);
